Articles.Content:
KSP Version: 0.25.0.642

What Happens: When the KSP Runway is destroyed, it leaves a gap where Kerbals and other things can go under the runway.

Steps to Replicate: Destroy the runway.

Result: Floating graphics/Glitchy Kerbal movement when moving them under the runway

Fixes/Workarounds:

Other Notes/Pictures/Log Files:

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/23970900573994309/619A40AA918423A8464ABF4917CA6244EEAC33E5/

http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/23970900574014733/13A258F7D0C12BE445E7E8E77447799D564D1EB8/

Edited November 20, 2014 by Claw

Thanks for posting this.

It's been noticed on a few of the buildings, but I don't believe it has been posted about the runway. Thanks!

Cheers,

~Claw
